objects.text: • 925 Sterling Silver • Gift for Her • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxurious and elegant jewelry advertisement theme. The centerpiece is a pair of rose gold wreath stud earrings (referenced via the *product_image*). The heading (*heading*) is designed in a large serif font, emphasizing sophistication and timeless appeal. A subheading (*subheading*) placed below provides a delicate, ornamental typeface complementing the jewelry theme. Below the product, a description line (*description*) highlights key product features. A circular badge overlay displays the price (*price*) with elegance. The “SHOP NOW” call-to-action (*cta* and *cta_background*) is designed in a bold magenta rectangle for immediate visibility. The backdrop features soft curved gradients and ornamental swirls, strengthening the feminine and classy vibe.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Gold: `#B76E79`
- Ballet Pink: `#FADADD`
- Magenta Pink: `#DB7093`
- Blush: `#FFF0F5`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image features a pair of delicate earrings with a romantic and luxurious aesthetic. The primary colors include a soft rose gold (#F4A7A0), which frames the entire design and creates a warm, feminine feel. Clear, brilliant crystals add high contrast and sparkle, with the most prominent being bright white (#FFFFFF) and icy silver (#E1E1E1). Subtle pink hues (#FAD4D8) are used in the petal-shaped elements, seamlessly blending with the rose gold frames. These shades are intricately blended to highlight the reflective surfaces of the stones while emphasizing the soft curves and metallic accents. Perfect for elegant yet modern promotional banners.
